df5031ec-b390-415a-94a0-defc3a57f939.description: Educators earning this badge designation have the ability to identify and implement key best practices in order to facilitate successful teaching and learning in a digital setting. This includes evaluating and applying online pedagogies based on the needs and expectations of today's non-traditional online student. Earners are able to identify, design, and facilitate an engaging student-centered course.
df5031ec-b390-415a-94a0-defc3a57f939.name: Walsh Certified Online Instructor

badge_template_activities.title: This course explores several key issues that educators need to apply in teaching and learning in the digital age, including best practices and online pedagogies. Participants look at how online learning is different from traditional methods of learning, examine how the digital practices of today's student are continually changing, and explore some key considerations that need to be addressed while designing and facilitating an engaging and student-centered learning environment.
